mapper.select: SELECT adname FROM ocn_address.sh_road_name_dic WHERE name = #{road};

SELECT district.district_name district, std_address.std_addr_id id, std_address.road_lane roadLane, std_address.addr_code addrCode, substreet.sub_district_name street, COMMIT .committee_name committe FROM ocn_address.of_std_address std_address LEFT JOIN ocn_address.sa_district district ON std_address.of_district_id = district.district_id LEFT JOIN ocn_address.sa_committee COMMIT ON std_address.of_committe_id = COMMIT.committee_id LEFT JOIN ocn_address.sa_subdistrict substreet ON std_address.of_block_id = substreet.sub_district_id LEFT JOIN ocn_address.of_road_lane_links road_lane_links ON std_address.std_addr_id = road_lane_links.std_addr_id WHERE road_lane_links.road_lane_id = ( SELECT road_lane_id FROM ocn_address.of_road_lane_match WHERE lianjia_residence_name = #{residence} OR soufang_residence_name = #{residence} OR iwjw_residence_name = #{residence} OR centanet_residence_name = #{residence} OR fangjia_residence_name = #{residence} OR lezhi_residence_name = #{residence} )

SELECT district.district_name district, substreet.sub_district_name street, COMMIT .committee_name committe, max(std_addr_id) id, addr_code addrCode, road_lane roadLane, building_no building, house_no houseNo FROM ocn_address.of_std_address std_address LEFT JOIN ocn_address.sa_district district ON std_address.of_district_id = district.district_id LEFT JOIN ocn_address.sa_committee COMMIT ON std_address.of_committe_id = COMMIT .committee_id LEFT JOIN ocn_address.sa_subdistrict substreet ON std_address.of_block_id = substreet.sub_district_id WHERE road_lane = '${model.road}${model.lane}'
AND building_no = '${model.building}'
AND house_no = '${model.houseNum}ход'
